comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: The date on the image is June 7, 1913. Nikolas Mateo Lettunich was a chemist who claimed to have invented an additive to gasoline to increase the efficiency of the combustion. It appears to be in conjunction with this article from September 6, 1913: news.google.com/newspapers?id=kfIgAAAAIBAJ&sjid=gnQFA... ... alluded to is Nicholas Lettunich registered in the freshman class of the university as a special student in chemistry His father is Mateo Lettunich who ...
